item.title: Small Business Today: Babies and businesses all deserve the right name
item.description: CLOSE I am proud to announce that Joanne and I have become proud grandparents again. Our daughter Emily and her husband Pete welcomed their fourth son to the family. Being traditional in their beliefs, they decided not to find out the sex of the baby before he was born.

item.title: Kate McKinnon Stars As Carole Baskin In Tiger King Series
item.description: Photo: Jon Kopaloff/Getty Images Have you always dreamed of watching Kate McKinnon feed a tiger dressed exclusively in animal print? Well your wish has been granted as the Emmy winning SNL vet is executive producing a limited series in which she will star as the notorious CEO of Big Cat Rescue Carole Baskin.

item.title: Coronavirus Is Accelerating Pluto TV’s Already Massive Growth
item.description: If there’s one category other than cannabis and toilet paper that’s doing pretty well right now, it’s streaming. “We’re in a fortunate spot,” said Tom Ryan, CEO of platform Pluto TV, where total viewing hours increased across the board last week.

item.title: قادة دول مجموعة العشرين يتعهدون بتشكيل 'جبهة موحدة' وبدعم الدول النامية ضد تفشي جائحة كورونا

item.title: Vendetta Finale: il film e l’istinto selvaggio di chi è colpito negli affetti più cari
item.description: News Cinema Un’emozione che ha dato un pizzico di tensione e immedesimazione in più a tanti thriller che questa volta vede coinvolto Antonio Banderas. Per alcuni è una scorciatoia per sceneggiatori a corto di idee, per altri è la rappresentazione dell’emozione più forte che un essere umano può provare: la violenza nei confronti della propria famiglia.

item.title: עופר שלח על הנדל והאוזר: 'צריך לטפל בהתנגדות של שני חברי כנסת בתוך כחול לבן'
item.description: חבר הכנסת עופר שלח (כחול לבן) התייחס להחלטה של חברי הכנסת יועז הנדל וצבי האוזר לדבוק בעמדתם טרם הבחירות ולהתנגד לממשלה צרה, וקרא להם לשקול שוב את עמדתם “צריך לטפל בהתנגדות של שני חברי כנסת בתוך כחולבן, שאני מכיר את עמדותיהם, ואני מכיר כמה מה שיולי אדלשטיין עשה בכל התהליך הזה זר להם ואני קורא להם לשקול שוב את עמדתם לאפשרות של ממשלת מיעוט”, אמר שלח.

item.title: Прокурор: Кожара говорил полиции, что будет расстреливать тех, кто ему угрожать
item.description: Суд отложил избрание меры пресечения подозреваемому в убийстве экс-министру иностранных дел Леониду Кожаре. Источник: заседание Шевченковского райсуда Киева; пост юридической компании “Миллер”, которая защищает пострадавших Детали: Прокурор объявил фабулы дела. Согласно ей, Кожара и его знакомый Сергей Старицкий якобы поссорились во время употребления алкоголя.

item.title: La divertida parodia de José María Listorti sobre el furcio de Rodolfo Barili
item.description: Mercedes Morán y Juan Leyrado se pusieron en la piel de los queridos personajes de Gasoleros, Roxy y Panigazzi. La pareja se reencontró de manera virtual a través de una videollamada en la que se pusieron al día sobre sus vidas y además se pasaron recomendaciones para prevenir el avance del coronavirus, como lavarse las manos y por sobre todo, quedarse en casa y cumplir con el aislamiento obligatorio.

item.title: 3 babies in China may have been infected with coronavirus in the womb
item.description: Three babies in China may have contracted the new coronavirus in the womb shortly before birth, according to two new reports. However, experts say the evidence in these cases is inconclusive and does not prove the new coronavirus, SARS-CoV-2, can pass from mother to child during pregnancy .

item.title: Hangi hastaneler pandemi hastanesi yapıldı? Pandemi hastanesi nedir?
item.description: Corona virüsü genelgesi ile özel ve vakıf hastaneleri pandemi hastanesi yapıldı. Vatandaşlar pandemi nedir, pandemi hastanesi ne demek merak ediyor. İşte yanıtı… PANDEMİ HASTANESİ NEDİR? Bünyesinde enfeksiyon hastalıkları ve klinik mikrobiyoloji, göğüs hastalıkları, iç hastalıkları uzmanı hekimlerinden en az ikisinin bulunduğu ve üçüncü seviye erişkin yoğun bakım yatağı bulunan hastaneler pandemi yani geniş bir alan etki gösteren salgın hastalıklarla mücadele hastanesi kabul edilir.

Photo: EPA-EFE/IAN LANGSDON Romanian writer and anti-Communist dissident Paul Goma has died in Paris aged 84 after being diagnosed with coronavirus, his biographer Mariana Sipos told the Romanian news portal G4Media on Wednesday.

item.title: Zawierzmy Polskę Niepokalanemu Sercu Maryi
item.description: W Święto Zwiastowania Pańskiego odbędzie się dziś akt zawierzenia Polski Niepokalanemu Sercu Maryi. Inicjatywę zapoczątkowało Stowarzyszenie Marsz Niepodległości. Znaleźliśmy się w nadzwyczajnej sytuacji. Nie tylko mamy do czynienia z zagrożeniem epidemicznym, ale i wzrastającymi napięciami geopolitycznymi, wojnami ekonomicznym oraz gospodarczymi, a także starciami ideologicznymi, które uderzają w sedno naszej tożsamości i cywilizacji – zauważył koordynator inicjatywy Wojciech Golonka.

item.title: UK coronavirus death toll jumps to 422 as study says HALF of Brits could already be infected with bug
item.description: THE UK coronavirus death toll hit 422 as a study claimed up to HALF the population may have caught the killer bug. Deaths jumped by 87 in just 24 hours on Tuesday - the biggest daily increase yet - with the youngest victim killed by the virus aged just 33.

item.description: My daughter is making crepes in the kitchen. The windows are open. A quiet breeze flutters in. The sun reflects off the shiny backs of my bay and black Trakehners in their grassy field behind my house.
